tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockHealthRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50),
    species VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    weight DECIMAL(10,2),
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    vaccination_schedule VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Livestock ( 
    livestock_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    species VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, 
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords ( 
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    livestock_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    record_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2), 
    weight DECIMAL(5,2) 
);

CREATE TABLE VaccinationSchedule ( 
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    livestock_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    due_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE livestock (
    livestock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    birth_date DATE,
    species VARCHAR(50),
    health_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE vaccination_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT,
    vaccination_date DATE,
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(255),
    veterinarian_name VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (livestock_id) REFERENCES livestock(livestock_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    species VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL,
    health_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Vaccination (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT REFERENCES Livestock(id),
    vaccine_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_administered DATE,
    next_due_date DATE,
    administered_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Health_Record (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    livestock_id INT REFERENCES Livestock(id),
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    condition VARCHAR(100),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE User (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Farm_Location (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    established_date DATE
);
